Module SC2002
Package sc2002

Class CCM

java.lang.Object
sc2002.User
sc2002.Student
sc2002.CCM
public class CCM extends Student
Represents a CCM (Campus Community Manager) who is a type of Student with additional functionalities. Extends the Student class.
Since:
25/11/2023
Author:
George Lai

  • Constructor Details

    • CCM

      public CCM(String name, String userID, String faculty, ArrayList<Enquiries> myEnquiries, ArrayList<Camp> registeredCamps, int ccmID)
      Constructs a CCM object with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the CCM
      userID - the user ID of the CCM
      faculty - the faculty to which the CCM belongs
      myEnquiries - list of enquiries made by the CCM
      registeredCamps - list of camps registered by the CCM
      ccmID - the unique identifier for the CCM
